import React, { useState } from "react"; function DurationBar(){ const [focusDuration, setFocusDuration] = useState(1500); const convertToMin = (seconds) => seconds / 60; return (
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: 00 : {convertToMin(focusDuration)}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current break session duration */} Break Duration: 05:00
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/} {/* TODO: Implement increasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/}
); } export default DurationBar;
